tags.name: activity
tags.description: Activity endpointsAn activity is a parent classification that contains Observations, Treatments, and Monitoring 'activities'

externalDocs.description: Visit GitHub to find out more about this API

Bearer.description: To access the authenticated api routes, a valid JWT token must be present in the 'Authorization' header.The 'Authorization' header value must be of the form: `Bearer xxxxxx.yyyyyyy.zzzzzz`

activity_date_time.title: Date and Time
activity_date_time.x-tooltip-text: Date and time of the activity

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.x-tooltip-text: Latitude of the anchor point for the specified geometry

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.x-tooltip-text: Longitude of the anchor point for the specified geometry

reported_area.title: Area (m²)
reported_area.x-tooltip-text: Area of the activity automatically created from the geometry in square metres

invasive_species_agency_code.title: Agency
invasive_species_agency_code.x-tooltip-text: Organization that is paying to have this work done

general_comment.title: Comment
general_comment.x-tooltip-text: Plain text description of any supporting information about the observation that is not captured elsewhere (up to 2000 characters)

access_description.title: Access Description
access_description.x-tooltip-text: Text entry to provide location and access directions. Locations should start general and get more specific

jurisdictions.title: Jurisdictions
jurisdictions.x-tooltip-text: Specify one or more jurisdictions for this activity

project_code.title: Project Code
project_code.x-tooltip-text: User defined identifier related to associated paper documents (alphanumeric, 50 characters)

invasive_species_agency_code.x-tooltip-text: Organization that is paying to have this work done

jurisdictions.title: Jurisdictions
jurisdictions.x-tooltip-text: Specify one or more jurisdictions for this activity

observer_first_name.x-tooltip-text: First name of person completing the observation

observer_last_name.title: Last Name
observer_last_name.x-tooltip-text: Last name of person completing the observation

observation_type_code.title: Type
observation_type_code.x-tooltip-text: Choose type of observation from dropdown

negative_obs_ind.title: Negative Observation
negative_obs_ind.x-tooltip-text: The observation describes the absence of target invasive plants within a defined area

observation_plant_terrestrial_data.x-tooltip-text: Please specify your observation specific data

invasive_plants.title: Terrestrial Invasive Plants
invasive_plants.x-tooltip-text: Specify one or more terrestrial invasive plants for this observation

invasive_plant_code.title: Invasive Plant
invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: Target invasive plant species at this location

treatment_organization.title: Treatment Organization
treatment_organization.x-tooltip-text: The company or organization conducting the treatment

monitoring_organization.title: Monitoring Organization
monitoring_organization.x-tooltip-text: The organization or company doing the monitoring

biological_agent_presence_code.title: Biological Agent Presence
biological_agent_presence_code.x-tooltip-text: Visible state of the agent present

count_duration.title: Duration of Count (min)
count_duration.x-tooltip-text: Time spent on counting the agents (minutes)

biological_agent_code.title: Biological Agent
biological_agent_code.x-tooltip-text: Genus species code of the agent (ie ALTICAR [Altica carduorum])

treatment_organization.title: Treatment Organization
treatment_organization.x-tooltip-text: The company or organization conducting the treatment

treatment_location.title: Treatment Location Description
treatment_location.x-tooltip-text: Text entry to provide location and access directions specific to this treatment

pesticide_use_permit_PUP.x-tooltip-text: Enter applicable number if treatment is being completed under pesticide use permit

pest_management_plan.x-tooltip-text: Enter applicable number if treatment is being completed under a pest management plan

temperature.x-tooltip-text: Measured in degrees celcius at time of treatment

wind_direction_code.x-tooltip-text: Cardinal wind direction at time of treatment

humidity.title: Humidity
humidity.x-tooltip-text: Relative humidity expressed as a percentage

encoded_file.description: A Data URL base64 encoded image

jurisdiction_code.title: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction_code.x-tooltip-text: Entity that owns or is responsible for the land base or water body

soil_texture_code.title: Soil Texture
soil_texture_code.x-tooltip-text: Relative amount of sand, silt, clay, organic matter, and bedrock throughout the observation area

specific_use_code.title: Specific Use
specific_use_code.x-tooltip-text: Notable land uses or attributes within the observation area

slope_code.title: Slope
slope_code.x-tooltip-text: Exact or general slope of the land expressed as a percentage

aspect_code.title: Aspect
aspect_code.x-tooltip-text: Average orientation that slope is facing within the observation area (ie; SE = southeast)

research_detection_ind.title: Research Observation
research_detection_ind.x-tooltip-text: Is this observation part of a research project? Add details in project code or comments fields

well_ind.title: Visible Well Nearby
well_ind.x-tooltip-text: Is there a visible well nearby? Indicate the distance from the observation in the comments

special_care_ind.title: Special Care
special_care_ind.x-tooltip-text: Designation to flag the potential for unique circumstances prior to treatment of the observation area

biological_ind.title: Biological Release
biological_ind.x-tooltip-text: Biocontrol treatment has occurred within the observation area

invasive_plant_code.title: Invasive Plant
invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: Target invasive plant species for this observation at this location. Create a separate observation for any other species at this location

invasive_plant_density_code.title: Density
invasive_plant_density_code.x-tooltip-text: Average number of individual plants per square meter expressed as a density class code

invasive_plant_distribution_code.title: Distribution
invasive_plant_distribution_code.x-tooltip-text: Description of the average arrangement of invasive plant clusters within the observation area expressed as a distribution code

plant_life_stage_code.title: Life Stage
plant_life_stage_code.x-tooltip-text: Average phenological stage of plant; rosette, flowering, etc

invasive_plant_code.title: Invasive Plant
invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: Target invasive plant species at this location

application_rate.title: Application Rate (L/ha)
application_rate.x-tooltip-text: Recommended label rate for herbicide (L/ha) used for this treatment

herbicide_amount.title: Amount of Mix Used (L)
herbicide_amount.x-tooltip-text: Volume in litres (ie 5.1 L) of herbicide and water mix

mix_delivery_rate.title: Delivery Rate of Mix (L/ha)
mix_delivery_rate.x-tooltip-text: Calibrated delivery rate of the device used to apply herbicide in L/ha

tank_volume.title: Tank Volume (L)
tank_volume.x-tooltip-text: Capacity of tank measured in litres

specific_treatment_area.title: Specific Treatment Area (ha)
specific_treatment_area.x-tooltip-text: Area of the chemical treatment (ha) automatically calculated from the application and delivery rates used during chemical treatment

dilution.title: Dilution %
dilution.x-tooltip-text: Percent (%) of product in the mix

invasive_plant_code.title: Invasive Plant
invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: Target invasive plant species at this location

invasive_plant_density_code.title: Density
invasive_plant_density_code.x-tooltip-text: Average number of individual plants per square meter expressed as a density class code

invasive_plant_distribution_code.title: Distribution
invasive_plant_distribution_code.x-tooltip-text: Description of the average arrangement of invasive plant clusters within the observation area expressed as a distribution code

soil_texture_code.title: Soil Texture
soil_texture_code.x-tooltip-text: Relative amount of sand, silt, clay, organic matter, and bedrock throughout the observation area

linear_infestation.title: Linear
linear_infestation.x-tooltip-text: If the infestation distribution is linear, select Yes

biological_agent_code.title: Proposed Biological Agent
biological_agent_code.x-tooltip-text: Genus species code of the agent (ie ALTICAR [Altica carduorum])

invasive_plant_code.title: Invasive Plant
invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: Invasive plant species observed at this location

transect_start_date_time.title: Start Date and Time
transect_start_date_time.x-tooltip-text: Start time and date of the collection

transect_end_date_time.title: End Date and Time
transect_end_date_time.x-tooltip-text: End time and date of the collection

project_number.title: Project Number
project_number.x-tooltip-text: The unique project or reference number (ie ABC123)

research_trial_code.title: Research Trial
research_trial_code.x-tooltip-text: Is this observation part of a research project or trial. If yes, add details in Project Code or Comments fields

site_aspect.title: Site Aspect
site_aspect.x-tooltip-text: Specify (in degrees) the direction that the slope is facing

site_aspect_variability.title: Site Aspect Variability
site_aspect_variability.x-tooltip-text: If the plant infestation extends into multiple aspects, select Yes

site_slope.title: Site Slope
site_slope.x-tooltip-text: Use a clinometer to obtain the percent of the slope for the site

site_slope_variability.title: Site Slope Variability
site_slope_variability.x-tooltip-text: If a plant infestation extends over more than one significant slope, select Yes

site_elevation.title: Site Elevation
site_elevation.x-tooltip-text: Use a GPS to obtain and record the average elevation

cloud_cover_code.title: Cloud Cover
cloud_cover_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative cloud cover

beaufort_wind_code.title: Wind
beaufort_wind_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative wind conditions

precipitation_code.title: Precipitation
precipitation_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative precipitation state

burn_severity_code.title: Burn Severity
burn_severity_code.x-tooltip-text: Has the observation area been burnt?

mesoslope_position_code.title: Mesoslope Position
mesoslope_position_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative mesoslope condition

site_surface_shape_code.title: Site Surface Shape
site_surface_shape_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative slope shape

soil_properties_code.title: Soil Properties
soil_properties_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative soil property

surface_substrate_code.title: Surface Substrate
surface_substrate_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative subsurface condition

site_activity_disturbance.title: Site Activity/Disturbance
site_activity_disturbance.x-tooltip-text: If the site is disturbed, select Yes

disturbance_site_defunct.title: Disturbance Site Defunct
disturbance_site_defunct.x-tooltip-text: If the site is defunct, select Yes

disturbance_condition_code.title: Disturbance Condition
disturbance_condition_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative disturbance condition

disturbance_type_code.title: Disturbance Type
disturbance_type_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative disturbance type

invasive_plant_change_code.title: Invasive Plant Change
invasive_plant_change_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the observed change on all species

target_plant_change_code.title: Target Plant Change
target_plant_change_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the observed change on the target species

treatment_seeded.title: Treatment Seeded
treatment_seeded.x-tooltip-text: If the observation area has been seeded, select Yes

trace_plants.title: Trace Plants
trace_plants.x-tooltip-text: If the observation has trace plants present, select Present

growth_pattern.title: Growth Pattern
growth_pattern.x-tooltip-text: Select the growth pattern on the target species

frame_size_code.title: Frame Size
frame_size_code.x-tooltip-text: Set the frame size for the collections

biocontrol_noted_code.title: Biocontrol Noted
biocontrol_noted_code.x-tooltip-text: If biological control agents are noted while completing the transects, select Yes and record the species found in the comments

photoplot_start.title: Photoplot Start
photoplot_start.x-tooltip-text: If photos were taken at the start point, select Yes

photoplot_end.title: Photoplot End
photoplot_end.x-tooltip-text: If photos were taken at the end point, select Yes

photoplot_aerials.title: Photoplot Aerials
photoplot_aerials.x-tooltip-text: Were aerial photos taken at 0, 10, 20, 30, 40, and 50m? If so, select Yes

photoplot_full_25m.title: Photoplot Full at 25m
photoplot_full_25m.x-tooltip-text: Provide the Full Photoplot form number

transect_line_id.x-tooltip-text: Provide a unique transect line identifier (ie ABC123)

transect_comment.x-tooltip-text: Provide a comment specific to the transect line
